message.body: Hey Midge, is it too late to put in an order for Adonis b day cake? I need it by Sunday. Sponge Bob theme...same size as last year with the minions.
Hey no its fine. . When would you need it for?
Sunday is his party. I could pick it up that morning
Ok that'll work. I had two orders for sat but they got bumped to fri so ill have sat to work on it.
Im heading to a viewing right now so ill text you tomorrow with the details/pricing
